titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 342) to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to make improvements to and reauthorize programs under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-154, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 342 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 63.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 276.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 200 (Roll no. 279).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/17/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on June 16, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 342 (child abuse and family violence prevention and treatment).
